name: Commando Blaze
description:
Commando Blaze is a light-hearted, action-packed, rage-quit game that average players should not even attempt to try. (I’m kidding. I’m begging you to try the game!)

It is inspired by classic Run & Gun games and I want to say it comes with a wonderful plot but no… it does have some weird dialogues and an end scene that will prove to be rather rewarding for retro game lovers.

It has 5 missions that can be completed within 10 minutes, or a few hours.

And each mission is truly a test of your endurance (and patience).

Featuring

- 11 characters each with a different gun!
- 5 extremely challenging missions
- Casual Boss fights
- Weird dialogues
- Comes with “retro” style cheat code

Check out our other games @ http://affinixygames.com
